hooks.command: input=$(cat); fp=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); if [[ "$fp" =~ \.(js|jsx|ts|tsx|mjs|cjs)$ ]] && [[ -f package.json ]]; then npm run lint --silent 2>/dev/null || true; fi

input=$(cat); cmd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty'); if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE '(migration|supabase)'; then echo 'Database operation detected - consider running backup checklist'; fi
